patthana8.36:4.1: Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.36:4.2: Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.36:4.3: Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko ca naacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.36:5.1: Naacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.36:5.2: Naacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.36:5.3: Naacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko ca naacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.36:6.1: Nacetasikañca naacetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.36:6.2: Nacetasikañca naacetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.36:6.3: Nacetasikañca naacetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko ca naacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.36:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane pañca … pe … avigate nava.
